amendment.description: Senate amendment inserts a complete new text entitled "Presidential Allowance Modernization Act of 2016" and appears on page H4562 of the Congressional Record of July 8, 2016.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 114-420 to require the Treasury Secretary's report to also include historical levels of federal revenue, including corporate and individual federal income taxes as a percent of gross domestic product.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
